sourcesContent:
Add New Product

Title is required Title must be at least 4 caracteres
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { Product } from '../Models/Product'; import { ProductService } from '../services/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-product', templateUrl: './add-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-product.component.css'] }) export class AddProductComponent { P:Product= {id: 1, title: "t", price: 0, quantity: 0, like: 0}; constructor(private prodS:ProductService){} addProduct( F: NgForm){ lo console.log(F); console.log(F.value); this.P.title = F.controls['title'].value; console.log(this.P.title); } }
